comment:
* Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a drm event
     * occurs

methods.name: void onEvent(@NonNull MediaDrm md, @Nullable byte[] sessionId, @DrmEvent int event, int extra, @Nullable byte[] data)
methods.comment:
* Called when an event occurs that requires the app to be notified
         *
         * @param md the MediaDrm object on which the event occurred
         * @param sessionId the DRM session ID on which the event occurred,
         *        or {@code null} if there is no session ID associated with the event.
         * @param event indicates the event type
         * @param extra an secondary error code
         * @param data optional byte array of data that may be associated with the event

methodNames: void onEvent(@NonNull MediaDrm md, @Nullable byte[] sessionId, @DrmEvent int event, int extra, @Nullable byte[] data)
